outputs.output_descr: The Assistance to Enable Trinidad and Tobago Fulfill its Obligation Under the Stockholm Convention on Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) project will assist in the formulation of the National Implementation Plan (NIP), a requirement of the Convention.
